entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SPRINKLES IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

RAIN
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

CLOUDY
RAIN LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
LOWS AROUND 50

RAIN LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
LOWS AROUND 50
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
